ingredients.content: 1 brown onion (approx. 180 g), cut into halves
3 sprigs fresh coriander, leaves only, to garnish

preparations.content: Place brown onion into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add olive oil and sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.<b>

Add ground ginger, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, ground black pepper, ground cinnamon, ground turmeric, chilli powder and ground nutmeg and cook <b>1 min/100°C/speed 1<b> to release the flavours.
Add water, vegetable stock paste, red lentils and canned crushed tomatoes and cook <b>20 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Season to taste, garnish with fresh coriander and serve soup hot.
